TaskPlannerService.description: Service for AI-assisted task planning and breakdown

methods.name: planTask
methods.description: Takes a task description and returns a structured list of steps

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Natural language description of the task

returns.description: Array of structured steps to complete the task

methods.name: parseSteps
methods.description: Parses the AI-generated response into a structured format

parameters.name: aiResponse
parameters.description: Raw response from the AI model

usage.notes: Uses OpenAI API key from services.php config
